ExploreFact.Text: I found a mural depicting a new species (that I will name the Hermets) Hearing a strange noise from above the ice.
I found a mural depicting the Hermets drilling to break the ice above.
I found a mural depicting the Hermets looking up at the stars for the first time and worshiping them.
I found a mural depicting the Hermets becomeing fearful at the signal disapering.
I found a mural depicting the Hermets building a ship to fly to where the singal was comming from.
